name: Wonderland (itch) (Blizzardfan)
description:
A old project I did 2 years ago. 

A new version of the game is on my developer page.

(https://blizzardfan.itch.io/game-lolol)

You are welcome to try the new version. ( It's much cooler!)

But this is some amazing memory of my journey in game development.

(if you are running on a PC with 60+ FPS you may encounter a bug at the last level. Sorry about that)
